note.p: Burial: Mausoleum of Greenwich hospital burial-ground, London
Career: Entered Royal Navy, reaching rank of Rear Admiral; arctic explorer; Controller of the Steam Department, Royal Navy
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1854-1855 vol 7 pp 603-612
Notes: Earlier date of death from DNB (index to BR says that this is the inaccurate one). Biography by A Parry (1963).
